dialogueSequence.sentence: My squire, when did your shield become so strong?
After I spent my life savings on it. Even in poverty, I would gladly give my life for you.
Please, return to your former self. Greed is unbecoming of you.
I will face my judgement honestly and without fear.
Would you kindly hand over the stone? Resistance will be met with death.
Rufus, why are you defending one who attempted to kill you?
Woof woof (Is this really the answer, killing those we hold dear?)
I wish my master had taught me the secrets of dog whispering.
You’re all jumping to conclusions too quickly.
For my life, and on my lost honor.  I will leave this town in the hands of the minister.
Bark Woof (I may be no paragon, but I can at least have a conscience.)
(It may not make up for the damage I’ve wrought, but some atonement is better than none.)
